Posts.Content: Sep 12, 2008 06:05AM janicel1 wrote: Cheryl, I'm sorry to hear about the loss of your dog and that you had to go through such a touch decision.   (((hugs))) My two "guys" (cattle dog and border collie/australian kelpie mix) are the center of my life. (Don't tell my husband. lol) These days they are my constant companions (along with the kitties), and they are being wonderfully attentive. The cattle dog loves lap sitting (at 30 lbs) and the kelpie mix is now wanting to sit in my lap too. 50 lbs in a lap that has recently undergone surgery - but worth it. I only hope that I have the strength to do the right thing if that day ever comes.  I truly dread losing them. janice
Posts.Title: My doggie passed away from cancer on Monday mason204 chipdog3
